definition: to settle a bill/to close an account
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: So the owner must pay attention to this, to control cost in construction stage consciously.
sentences.chinese: 工程结算支付是承包工程合同管理的核心。

sentences.english: Above prices are in MOP and are subject to 10% service charge.
sentences.chinese: 以上价目以澳门币结算，需附加10%的服务费。

sentences.english: You don't choose five permanents you control until Clarion Ultimatum resolves.
sentences.chinese: 结算号召通牒时，你才需要选择五个永久物。

sentences.english: The price fixed by the clearing house at which deliveries on futures are invoiced.
sentences.chinese: 由结算所确定的期货商品交割的票面价格。

sentences.english: E-billing as one of modern logistics enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 电子商务结算为一体的现代化物流企业。

sentences.english: We shall open a letter of credit in your favour to be settled in US dollars.
sentences.chinese: 我们将开立以你方为收益人的信用证，以美元结算。

sentences.english: Financial year-end date not coterminous with that of the Government.
sentences.chinese: 财政年度结算日期与政府的不同。

sentences.english: The charge of water is settled and paid to the actual usage each month.
sentences.chinese: 乙方使用的自来水费按实结算，每月支付甲方。

sentences.english: The applicant is required to submit the Guarantee Fund and Cash Position.
sentences.chinese: 申请人应当向本公司交纳结算保证金以及结算备付金。

sentences.english: The applicant is required to submit the Guarantee Fund and Cash Position.
sentences.chinese: 申请人应当向本公司交纳结算保证金以及结算备付金。

sentences.english: After paying the bill, he braved the snow storm and started trekking north, carrying Violet in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 结算了店帐，抱着阿紫，冲风冒雪的向北行走。

sentences.english: We have run the pilot program of settling cross-border trade with RMB, in particular, trade in goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们实现了货物贸易在香港以人民币结算的试点。

sentences.english: Actual slot machines are far more complicated, and balancing the payout is tricky.
sentences.chinese: 实际的老虎机要复杂得多，并且结算奖金十分棘手。

sentences.english: Do you balance your checking account each month?
sentences.chinese: 每个月有没有结算一下你的活期账户？

sentences.english: Around half of apartment sales in Shanghai are done in cash, says Mr. Gu.
sentences.chinese: 顾先生认为，上海住房销售的一半左右都以现金结算。

sentences.english: The trade contract stipulates for the settlement of balances in RMB.
sentences.chinese: 贸易合同规定余额以人民币结算。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
to pay a sum of money/payment
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
to pay sb else's expense with the expectation of being reimbursed by that person later
